item.title: Error Loading... Please Contact Staff[Resolved]

In Client.java I found this { if(decompressors[0] != null) { abyte0 = decompressors[0].decompress(i); } if(abyte0 == null) { drawLoadingText(0, "Connecting to File Server..."); new Update("http://insidiax.com/InsidiaX.zip", "cache.zip", signlink.findcachedir()); abyte0 = decompressors[0].decompress(i); } } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } if(abyte0 != null) { NamedArchive archive = new NamedArchive(abyte0, s); return archive; } while (true) { drawLoadingText(0, "Error loading... Contact Staff!"); try { Thread.sleep(1000); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); }. Could this be the cause of the problem? Thank you by the way!

item.title: Error Loading... Please Contact Staff[Resolved]
item.dc:creator: @Silico Silico
item.description:
@Silico wrote:

So, I am trying to make a custom webclient for my server. I am using Project Eden source and client, which is a Project Insidiax V2 base. My problem is that I want my client to load off of the cache called ProjectCridCache, however even after changing the code in SignLink.java from public static String findcachedir() { String as[] = {"C:/"}; if(storeid < 32 || storeid > 34) storeid = 32; String s = "ProjectEdenCache"; for(int i = 0; i < as.length; i++) try { to public static String findcachedir() { String as[] = {"C:/"}; if(storeid < 32 || storeid > 34) storeid = 32; String s = "ProjectCridCache"; for(int i = 0; i < as.length; i++) try { the client still tries to load from ProjectEdenCache! How I know it is trying to load from ProjectEdenCache is because it give me the “Error Loading… Please Contact Staff” error and it creates a ProjectEdenCache folder. So my C:\ drive now looks like . And all that the ProjectEdenCache folder contains is this . Any help would be MUCH appreciated!<3 I know it’s probably a simple fix, but I’m a nub… THANK YOU!

Read full topic
